articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Trump's Radical Overhaul: A Domestic Shake-Up
articles.description: The Trump administration, with Elon Musk's support, is making sweeping changes across the U.S. federal government, impacting the judiciary system by challenging lease use and firing thousands of probationary staff. It halts crucial programs such as wildfire prevention and dismantles renowned disaster response teams, sparking both support and frustration.
articles.content: The Trump administration, led by President Donald Trump and backed by billionaire Elon Musk, is pressing forward with sweeping changes across multiple levels of the federal government. Reports indicate a new focus on the judiciary system, as the admi... [1150 chars]

articles.title: Trump administration fires over 400 DHS employees as mass firings continue
articles.description: Officials at DHS said they had fired hundreds of employees across several of its agencies.
articles.content:
Washington — The Trump administration on Friday moved to fire more than 400 employees at the Department of Homeland Security, the latest effort in a government-wide campaign to dramatically reduce the federal workforce.

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Trump Administration Puts CFPB Purge on Hold Following Court Order
articles.description: President Donald Trump's administration has agreed not to fire additional staff at the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau following a court order, temporarily halting a feared mass layoff. This decision came amid allegations of plans to dismantle the agency, opposed by employee unions and advocacy groups.
